Dispute(address,uint256,uint256,uint256).details: To be emitted when a dispute is created to link the correct meta-evidence to the disputeID.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.
params._evidenceGroupID: Unique identifier of the evidence group that is linked to this dispute.

MetaEvidence(uint256,string).details: To be emitted when meta-evidence is submitted.

Ruling(address,uint256,uint256).details: To be raised when a ruling is given.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.

params._arbitrator: The address of the new arbitrator.

params._governor: The address of the new governor.

params._receiverGateway: The address of the new receiver gateway.

changeVea(address).details: Changes the vea inbox, useful to increase the claim deposit.

params._veaInbox: The address of the new vea inbox.

disputeHashToHomeID(bytes32).details: Looks up the local home disputeID for a disputeHash. For cross-chain Evidence standard.

relayCreateDispute(uint256,bytes32,uint2.details: Provide the same parameters as on the foreignChain while creating a dispute. Providing incorrect parameters will create a different hash than on the foreignChain and will not affect the actual dispute/arbitrable's ruling.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Give a ruling for a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrator. The purpose of this function is to ensure that the address calling it has the right to rule on the contract.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the Arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Not able/wanting to make a decision".
